page.title: 06FAMILY LIFE 3.
page.content: My husband is a Chartered Building Surveyor and is self-employed. He has his office in Ashford High Street and I work for him doing his administration work at home. Our life is a fairly full but simple one. Our two children attend Hamstreet County Primary School which is just over three miles away from our house and they are picked up each morning outside our gate and taken to school by a school bus. They are likewise brought home here in the evenings. The bus arrives to take them to school at approximately 8.30a.m. every week day morning and they arrive home at about 3.45p.m. each day. My children enjoy swimming and my husband and I and the children usually go by car on a Saturday morning to Hythe Swimming Baths.
